means: （使）痛苦不已，（使）怨恨不已( rankle的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Yet the knowledge imparted to him by the chambermaid was rankling in his mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 可是女仆告诉他的消息刺痛着他的心.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Of sorrow ' s rankling shaft to cure the wound ,, 把悲痛那可恨的箭伤治愈,

list.abs: Of sorrow ' s rankling shaft to cure the wound ,, 把悲痛那可恨的箭伤治愈,
notwithstanding my right I am set at nought ; in my wound rankles , sinless though I am .我虽无罪无辜，却成了说谎者；我虽未行不义，却受了不可医治的创伤。
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... ranking 评分等级 rankle 溃烂 rankly 繁茂地.
You burrow and rankle in his heart !, 你挖掘并折磨他的心灵!

entry.def: If an event or situation rankles, it makes you feel angry or bitter afterwards, because you think it was unfair or wrong.

example.ex: They paid him only £10 for it and it really rankled...
example.tran: 他们仅为此付给他10英镑，这真让他感到愤怒。

example.ex: Britain's refusal to sell Portugal arms in 1937 still rankled with him...
example.tran: 1937年英国拒绝向葡萄牙销售武器的事情仍然令他愤慨。

auth_sentence.content: They are also rankling technology giants from Silicon Valley to Seoul.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are also rankling technology giants from Silicon Valley to Seoul.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are also rankling technology giants from Silicon Valley to Seoul.
